description:
Matt is a marked man. Matt has just
found a way to save his life. All he
needs to do is win an illicit,
coast-to-coast race from San
Francisco to New York. Itâ€™s called The
Run, three-thousand miles of
unforgiving asphalt from San Francisco
to New York. No speed limits. No
rules. No allies. Armed with just his
guts and instinct, Matt battles a field
of the most notorious drivers ever
assembled. Dense city streets, icy
mountain passes and narrow canyons
push his driving skills to the limit.
Relentlessly hunted by the police, as
well as the men who want him dead,
Matt is racing for his life.
name: Need for Speed: The Run
